name: leaflet-trace

scripts.minify: uglifyjs src/leaflet.trace.js -o dist/leaflet.trace.js & npx postcss src/leaflet.trace.css > dist/leaflet.trace.css
scripts.prepublishOnly: uglifyjs src/leaflet.trace.js -o dist/leaflet.trace.js & npx postcss src/leaflet.trace.css > dist/leaflet.trace.css

description: Simple tool to select and trace lines in leaflet
author: Alex Gilvarry
